titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology in the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology in the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

bill.summary: This resolution provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology for the 119th Congress.
